thuna wasare awasana wara wibhage panthiye 2 weniya wunu mama hathara wasare awasana wibhagedi panthiye lamayi 52 atharin 41 weniya wenakan pahalata watuna.ehema duruwala lamayek weddi amma mawa shishsathwe pas karana adahasa atha arala samanya wada karanna puluwan thathweta ganna loku uthsahayak gaththa.me widiyata 8 wasarata wenakan panthiye duruwala lamayi 10 dena athara nitharama man hitiya.panthiye mona waradak wela thibunath api diha hamoma balanne aparadha karayek widiyata.hama wibhagayakadi 35 th 42 athara man nitharama dolanaya wuna.ee widiyata 9 wasara aluth panthiyakata aawa.ethakota ape piriyad 8 ma guru waru 8 denek uganwanne.apita ingrisi igannuwe indrani mis.iskole hitapu godak sara mis kenek.

nithi wirodhi lesa oostreliyawa bala pitathwa yamata sudanam wa siti shri lankika sankramanikayan 6 denaku kalkuda pradeshaye di ath adanguwata gena atha.oostreliyawa bala pitathwa yamata sudanamin siti me pirisa kalkuda polis balapradeshayata ayath karungalachola, aliyagala muhudu thiraye di athadanguwata path wu bawa polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha dinamina ta pawasiya.eeye (02) aluyama 1.30ta pamana athadanguwata gath me nithi wirodhi sankramanikayan pirisa walachchena pa්radeshaye padinchikaruwan wana athara owun awurudu 22th 35th athara wayase pasuwana bawada polis madhya prakashakawaraya sandahan kaleya.kalkuda polisiye polis sthanadhipathiwaraya athulu niladharin kandayamak wisin me pirisa ath adanguwata gena thibena athara siyalu denama drawida jathikayan bawada owun walachchena mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha eeye (02) idiripath kirimata niyamithawa thibunu bawada hethema sandahan kaleya.me minis jawarame pa්radhana jawaramkaru kawuda yanna gana anawaranaya kara ganimata kalkuda polisiya wadidura wimarshana pawathwagena yayi.pasugiya dina kihipaye di nithi wirodhi lesa shri lankika sankramanikayan wishala pramanayak ostreliyawa bala pitathwa giya athara thawath pirisak ese yamata sudanamin sitiya di ath adanguwata pathwuha.rakawaranaya patha melesa nithi wirodhi sankramanikayan wishala washayen shri lankawen pana yamata uthsaha kala da shri lankawe kisindu awadhanam thaththwayak nathayi lokaye wiwidha ratawal saha jathyanthara sanwidhana rasak penwa di thibe..
